configs.systemStatus.title: System status
configs.systemStatus.description: Review debugging, cache, and logging flags that shape backend behaviour.
configs.systemStatus.invalidResponse: Unexpected response when loading system status
configs.systemStatus.details.updateHint: Update by running `export {{key}}=value` or editing `.env`, then restart the app.
configs.systemStatus.actions.purgeCacheC: Purge all cached data now? This clears cache entries across every tenant.
configs.cache.title: Cache overview
configs.cache.description: Inspect cached responses and clear segments when necessary.
configs.cache.empty: No cached responses for this tenant.
configs.cache.purgeAllConfirm: Purge all cached entries for this tenant?
configs.cache.purgeSegmentConfirm: Purge cached entries for this segment?
configs.systemStatus.categories.profilin: Flags that control request and query profiling outputs.
configs.systemStatus.categories.loggingD: Tune verbosity and SQL logging for diagnostics.
configs.systemStatus.categories.security: Password policy requirements enforced at login and user creation.
configs.systemStatus.categories.cachingD: Cache providers and TTL controls for backend responses.
configs.systemStatus.categories.queryInd: Controls for query index maintenance and safety nets.
configs.systemStatus.categories.entities: Compatibility toggles for custom entity persistence.
configs.systemStatus.variables.omProfile: Comma separated filters enabling the backend tree profiler.
configs.systemStatus.variables.nextPubli: Browser-side flag enabling the tree profiler from the client bundle.
configs.systemStatus.variables.omCrudPro: Filters enabling detailed CRUD profiling payloads.
configs.systemStatus.variables.omQeProfi: Filters enabling hybrid query engine profiling snapshots.
configs.systemStatus.variables.queryEngi: Log raw SQL generated by the hybrid query engine.
configs.systemStatus.variables.logVerbos: Overrides structured log verbosity such as debug or trace.
Fallback log level applied when verbosity is not set.
configs.systemStatus.variables.passwordM: Minimum number of characters required for passwords.
configs.systemStatus.variables.passwordR: Require at least one numeric character.
Require at least one uppercase letter.
Require at least one special character.
configs.systemStatus.variables.enableCru: Enable the CRUD API response cache layer.
configs.systemStatus.variables.cacheSqli: Filesystem path for the SQLite cache file.
configs.systemStatus.variables.scheduleA: Automatically schedule query index reindex jobs when gaps appear.
configs.systemStatus.variables.optimizeI: Skip immediate coverage recalculation during read operations.
configs.systemStatus.variables.forceQuer: Serve query index results even when coverage is partial.
configs.systemStatus.variables.entitiesB: Mirror custom entity writes into the legacy EAV tables.
